column1: Celeborn was the name of the White Tree that flourished in Tol Eressëa. It was a seedling of the tree Galathilion
column2: which in turn had been made in image of Telperion
column3: the eldest of the Two Trees of Valinor.

column1: Celeborn was an ancestor to the White Tree of Númenor and of White Tree of Minas Tirith.
